医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
孕妇氟化物含量较高与儿童的神经行为问题有关佛罗里达大学公共卫生与健康专业学院研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，孕妇体内较高的氟化物含量与其孩子在 3 岁时出现神经行为问题的几率增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Higher-fluide-levels-in-pregnant-women-tied-to-childrens-neurobehavioral-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Higher-fluide-levels-in-pregnant-women-tied-to-childrens-neurobehavioral-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a715393c-b8b7-41aa-bbea-b509d742649d Mon, 20 May 2024 15:19:17 -0400 Higher fluoride levels in pregnant women tied to children's neurobehavioral problems
印度地方性人群中发现遗传性铁缺陷尽管缺铁性贫血是全球最普遍的贫血形式，但由于缺乏认识或缺乏系统的筛查，它可能被诊断不足。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Inherited-iron-defects-uncovered-in-endemic-Indian-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Inherited-iron-defects-uncovered-in-endemic-Indian-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=649b8855-c7c1-4761-9445-e54be8769c52 Mon, 20 May 2024 15:13:00 -0400 Inherited iron defects uncovered in endemic Indian population
查加斯病引起的心脏损伤的新机制被发现乔蒂·纳加乔蒂博士和她在哈肯萨克子午线发现与创新中心 (CDI) 的实验室已经确定了慢性恰加斯病（一种影响全世界数百万人的寄生虫感染）可能导致不可逆转且可能致命的心脏损伤的主要机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/New-mechanism-discovered-for-Chagas-disease-induced-heart-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/New-mechanism-discovered-for-Chagas-disease-induced-heart-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f57ceeb1-5adc-40de-901e-2657b58d0149 Mon, 20 May 2024 15:08:35 -0400 New mechanism discovered for Chagas disease-induced heart damage
细菌中两种新发现的机制可能导致抗生素耐药性细菌中两种新发现的机制已被确定，它们可能有助于抗生素耐药性的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Two-newly-discovered-mechanisms-in-bacteria-can-contribute-to-antibiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Two-newly-discovered-mechanisms-in-bacteria-can-contribute-to-antibiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f61c7f2a-4436-498a-9100-824b747cf0ea Mon, 20 May 2024 14:40:00 -0400 Two newly discovered mechanisms in bacteria can contribute to antibiotic resistance
禁用生存途径可能是脑肿瘤治疗的一种有前途的策略当你禁用赛车的刹车时，它很快就会崩溃。 Barak Rotblat 博士想要对脑癌细胞进行类似的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Disabling-survival-pathways-could-be-a-promising-strategy-for-brain-tumor-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Disabling-survival-pathways-could-be-a-promising-strategy-for-brain-tumor-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3f9b487-362d-4acc-9875-538fa8e29c3f Mon, 20 May 2024 14:32:56 -0400 Disabling survival pathways could be a promising strategy for brain tumor treatment
研究显示基于互联网的 CBT 可以有效减少抑郁和失眠希伯来大学的一项新研究考察了基于互联网的引导认知行为疗法对抑郁症的效果，重点关注治疗联盟和依恋风格。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Internet-based-CBT- effectively-reduces-depression-and-insomnia-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Internet-based-CBT-efficiently-reduces-depression-and-insomnia-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08e1a41d-a88e-4717-a15e-dea50ceb0cee Mon, 20 May 2024 14:06:00 -0400 Internet-based CBT effectively reduces depression and insomnia, study shows
哥伦比亚研究人员将铁死亡与 COVID-19 肺部疾病联系起来在一些严重的 COVID-19 病例中，肺部会遭受极度损伤，导致一系列危及生命的疾病，如肺炎、炎症和急性呼吸窘迫综合征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Columbia-researchers-link-ferroptosis-to-COVID-19-lung-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Columbia-researchers-link-ferroptosis-to-COVID-19-lung-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65fb1fa4-daab-4656-8c60-a7c3070d59de Mon, 20 May 2024 14:02:16 -0400 Columbia researchers link ferroptosis to COVID-19 lung disease
使用 HyNT 印章系统进行细胞内蛋白质递送：癌症治疗的飞跃蛋白质的细胞内递送是揭示细胞功能、蛋白质复合物结构和治疗的重要技术。然而，传统的递送方法有一些局限性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Intracellular- Protein-delivery-with-HyNT-stamp-system-A-leap-forward-in-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Intracellular- Protein-delivery-with-HyNT-stamp-system-A-leap-forward-in-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bae5c1e-d8e1-40e8-8f7a-f2c6ce6e143c Mon, 20 May 2024 13:57:22 -0400 Intracellular protein delivery with HyNT stamp system: A leap forward in cancer therapy
全国民意调查显示，父母很难监控青少年的咖啡因摄入量根据一项全国民意调查，四分之一的父母表示咖啡因基本上是他们青少年日常生活的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Parents-struggle-to-monitor-teens-caffeine-intake-national-poll-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Parents-struggle-to-monitor-teens-caffeine-intake-national-poll-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=806a1a2a-9d94-4c6c-89a0-1e6b49238c05 Mon, 20 May 2024 13:53:00 -0400 Parents struggle to monitor teens' caffeine intake, national poll reveals
胆囊癌的发病率总体下降，但美国黑人的发病率有所上升根据计划在 2024 年消化疾病周上发表的一项研究，过去 20 年来，大多数美国人的胆囊癌发病率一直稳定或下降，但黑人的胆囊癌发病率稳步上升，越来越多的人直到晚期才被诊断出来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Gallbladder-cancer-incidence-declines-overall-but-increases-among-Black-Americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Gallbladder-cancer-incidence-declines-overall-but-increases-among-Black-Americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c009df8-44f1-4b1f-b136-5eb79cd65137 Mon, 20 May 2024 13:46:23 -0400 Gallbladder cancer incidence declines overall but increases among Black Americans
